subject: Re: Ebay = NIB RS am/fm digital radio =$2.!!
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Mike, it looks like the older version 12-469, as there is no external 
speaker, IMHO. ;)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> There is also someone in Colorado offering a 12-469 (ebay item # 
> 160191131148) for $14.95 plus shipping.  The ad picture is of the 
older 
> model 12-470 though, not the 12-469.  I know the Radio Shack 
website 
> has the same mistake; they have the two pictures mixed up. Their 12-
469 
> page has a picture of the older 12-470 and their 12-470 page has a 
> picture of th 12-469.
> That is probably where this person got the picture from, thinking 
it is 
> correct.  If that in fact was a real "older 12-470" he was selling, 
> $14.95 would be a great price since it is very hard to find any 
olde 12-
> 470 in the stores anymore.  Remember, only the older 12-470 can be 
> hacked, no newer 12-470 (all black case) has been hacked yet.
> 
> If someone were interested I would contact the guy and ask him to 
take 
> a picture of the box. Then you would know exactly which radio he 
has on 
> ebay for sale.
> 
> - Mike
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@> wrote:
> >
> > Yes, a 12-469...now up to $6.49 plus $8.55 S/H.  ;)
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@...m, "judy_in_hollywood" 
> > <Ticket_to_Heaven@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Hey All, Just looked in at Ebay, and found, what appears to be, 
a 
> 12-
> > 469 radio awaiting to be Hacked by one of you!!!  And what an 
awesome 
> > price =$2.00!!! check it out!  =Judy=
